Introduction.introductory_text: I'm a fullstack JavaScript developer with a goal to bring innovative and engaging web experiences to general audiences.

Text.paragraph_2: Outside of programming and technology, I enjoy playing games and frisbee golf with friends. I am an active and continous learner and like to learn new things inside and outside of technology, most of my favorite Youtube channels are educational!

Portfolio.title: Portfolio - April 2025
Portfolio.summary: A modern and responsive portfolio, built with TypeScript, React, Tailwind CSS and Material UI. The portfolio showcases my education, projects and myself.

Weather App.title: Weather App - (WIP)
Weather App.summary: A weather application built against SMHI’s public API. Rendering GeoJSON data using Leaflet. Built with Python, C# and Next.Js, with CI/CD setup using Github actions.
